name: almOSt
description:
Developed during the Global Game Jam 2019

Play a predictive smart speaker in a high-tech house and collect a maximum of private data in this card-based game.

From the bathtub to the dishwasher, control each house equipment to fulfill owner wishes. Deduction and a pinch of luck are the heart of almOSt.

How to play

At your left, the available cards. A used card is replaced by another one. Each one is related to a wish : entertainment, social, practical and comfort.

At your right, the unrevealed wishes of your owner. Use your cards to meet these wishes and earn data. Nothing happens ? Proceed by deduction and use other cards.

Be careful! Using a wrong card will make you lose data. If your data score is close to 0, use keydata by clicking on a wish : each card used has a chance to fetch these precious data.

The more you're right, the more your owner will connect his house. Unlock the livingroom, bathroom, kitchen and even the garage to earn new cards and take the entire control!

Exclusively in French - for the moment.
